title: ID this font
content:
Hi gals & guys, can you please identify this font? Already tried online tools with no success. Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090628212518im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pink_6580.jpg)
author: rubinho

comments.content: I believe this is a free font, but not sure on the name. I’d check [www.dafont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20090628212518/http:/www.dafont.com/ "www.dafont.com")

That seems like a pretty clever design for a freebie, noticing the way the i ligatures are worked. I’m thinking this is a commercial design, but I don’t know it.

- Mike Yanega

It has some resemblance to [Expletive Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20090628212518/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=VIT0000007#specimen) at Veer, but I am still looking.

- Mike Yanega

The most similar freebie I could find was [Lowdown BRK](http://web.archive.org/web/20090628212518/http:/www.dafont.com/lowdown-brk.font?nb_ppp=50&text=pinkie).

- Mike Yanega
